summary: When her family misses her jump roping competition, a 16-year-old girl and her siblings hold their parents hostage, hoping to correct their unsatisfying behavior.
cast: Kristin Chenoweth|Matthew Modine|Olesya Rulin|Joey King|Shirley Jones|Eddie Hassell|Chloe Bridges|Adam Saunders|Robbie Tucker|Peter Gail|Chase Yi|Lauren LaStrada|Paul Black|Cindy Chang|Lynn Anderson|Marc Bowers|Arthur Cartwright|Patricia Lynne Cissell|Tiffani Elise Edwards|Jamie Gasper|Jordan Mahome|Kyle Misak|Ryan Remisoski|Jacob Scherba
title: Fin de semana en familia
